Description

Off-Score Project team is small international team aiming to make games around music, and to provide listeners with a playful experience that highlights the lyrics and enhances the stories of the songs.

History

The name Off-Score comes from our vision to take people out of the "game score" and "music score", steer them "off-score".

Ferran Bertomeu Castells

Taiwan-based Catalan game designer & programmer. 10+ years professional experience in game programming, including: Disney: Spellstruck, LifeSlide and Monkey-catching Game.

YenTing Lo

Taiwanese jazz singer-songwriter, music producer and cross-media creator. Past music releases include 2 albums and 2 EPs and have won several Golden Indie Music Awards(TW). 9 years experience working in interactive work with Ferran.
